quote_first:
I don't like this waiting, he said.
She smiled. “You'd make a terrible PI.”
“What time is it?”
“
quote_last: . Fifteen minutes later than the last time you asked.”
title: Copper River
author: William Kent Krueger

quote_first: This Saturday he had left the greetings to Father Martin, but at
quote_last: he thought it would be courteous to put in an appearance.
title: Death in Holy Orders
author: P.D. James

quote_last: E.T.A Weight room. Freestyle circuits. The clank and click of various resistance systems.
title: Infinite Jest
author: David Foster Wallace

quote_first: She looks at the clock. She's in the kitchen. A minute left. She waits. It's
quote_last: . She picks up the eclair. She licks the cream out of it. She watches herself.It's fuckin' stupid. But. She bites into the chocolate, and the pastry that's been softened by the cream. Jack's not home yet. Leannes's at work. Paula will be leaving, herself, in a bit. She's a year off the drink. Exactly a year. She looks at the clock. A year and a minute.
title: Paula Spencer
author: Roddy Doyle

quote_last: . Lying on the sand, the woman in the black suit saw it coming and relaxed.
title: The Women
author: Ray Bradbury
